## first variable

Returns the first element of the given list or string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
first: {
    (val: string): string;
    <T extends unknown[]>(val: T): T["length"] extends 0 ? undefined : InferArray<T> | undefined;
}
```

## Example 1


```ts
// String
first('hello') // 'h'

```

## Example 2


```ts
// Array
first('hello', 'new', 'world') // 'hello'
first([]) // undefined
first(['one', 2, 3, 4]) // 'one'

```
